Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, with gradual curve. Clay near fine pink-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp. Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie noted several such stamps in his 1884-5 diary (EES Archive XVII 47). From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0337.21.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0459)
